# Enlightening Mathematics Revision Book Volume 1


## About the Authors

Martin, with an MSc in Medical Statistics, and Gatungo, holding a BSc in Mechanical Engineering, both have extensive experience teaching mathematics in various Kenyan schools. Their deep knowledge of mathematical concepts, combined with a clear understanding of the challenges students face while studying the subject, informs their teaching and approach.
